data.prayer: Lord, make the 27,973 believers in West to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,515,027 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West, NCT of Delhi, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of West to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in West, NCT of Delhi, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in West. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in West, NCT of Delhi, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rohini
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rohini, NCT of Delhi, India.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of West, NCT of Delhi, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of West, NCT of Delhi, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of West, NCT of Delhi, India. Please, stir the 27,973 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: West
location.cities_list: Delhi, Najafgarh, Rohini, Karol Bāgh, New Delhi
location.cities_list_w_pop: Delhi (10,927,986), Najafgarh (1,365,000), Rohini (860,000), Karol Bāgh (505,241), New Delhi (317,797)
